alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 4:14AM CDT until April 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Harper, Woods, Ellis, Roger Mills, Beckham and Harmon Counties. In Texas, Hardeman, Foard and Knox Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM Tuesday to 1 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
